channel.title: Experiences on Shizra Tariq
channel.description: Recent content in Experiences on Shizra Tariq

item.title: Experience
item.description: Research Assistant Company: College of Science and Engineering, University of Minnesota Location: Minneapolis, MN, USA Start Date: June 2024 End Date: Present Collaborated on robotic surgery for histotripsy using the UR5e robotic arm with ROS2 and MoveIt2 in Python. Mapped singular configurations in C-space to improve motion planning. Developed path-planning algorithms for constrained and unconstrained trajectories, ensuring collision avoidance in an aquatic environment.
